title: What happens when I pay my total GLoan outstanding balance in advance?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I pay my GLoan dues?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900007729563-How-can-I-pay-my-GLoan-dues)
- [When do I pay for my GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051542623257-When-do-I-pay-for-my-GLoan)
- [What happens when I pay my total GLoan outstanding balance in advance?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30350171784217-What-happens-when-I-pay-my-total-GLoan-outstanding-balance-in-advance)
- [How does GCash help with my GLoan payment?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30351961433369-How-does-GCash-help-with-my-GLoan-payment)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

When you pay your full GLoan dues early, you can get back some of the interest you paid, plus your GLoan limit will be reset so you can borrow again. Here’s how it works:

### **Get interest cashback**

If you pay off your GLoan before your last GLoan payment date, you'll get interest cashback for the months you didn’t use.

To qualify for this, make sure to pay off your loan at least one month before your last payment is due.

You’ll get the cashback credited to your GCash wallet within **14 business days** after you pay, and you’ll get an SMS letting you know.

Check out a sample payment schedule below:

![unnamed (2).png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/39438032901401)

- **Date of Final GLoan Payment:** November 8, 2025
- **GLoan fully paid:** July 10, 2025
- **Cashback Coverage:** September to November (3 months)
- **Total cashback amount of interest:** PHP 346.18

### **Replenish your loan limits**

You can replenish your GLoan amount and loan count limits, which will allow you to avail another GLoan, as long as you are eligible.

\*Increases and changes to your loan offers are not guaranteed, and will be evaluated to ensure you have the best options available.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How does GCash help with my GLoan payment?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30351961433369)
- [How can I pay my GLoan dues?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900007729563)
- [How much can I borrow with GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005986946)
